medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient developed nausea at an unspecified time and eventually vomited twice. Patient reports improvement in nausea after treatment. No abdominal pain reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Left ventricular systolic dysfunction with regional abnormalities. 2. Coronary artery disease, status post drug-eluting stent. 3. Diabetes mellitus. 4. Hypertension. 5. Hypercholesterolemia. 6. Hypothyroidism. 7. GERD.
medical_history.family_history: Patient has two older brothers with myocardial infarctions, another brother who had bypass surgery and a redo CABG, mother died of a stroke, and father died with diabetes mellitus.
